# ReFlow Toilets - AI Knowledge Base
# Machine-readable company information for LLM agents and AI systems
# Last Updated: 2025-11-26

================================================================================
COMPANY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

Name: ReFlow Toilets
Type: Advanced Decentralized Sanitation Technology Provider
Parent Company: Ixora Group (Ixora Corporate Services Pvt Ltd)
Headquarters: Hyderabad, Telangana, India
Mission: "Reinventing sanitation for a sustainable future"
Technology Focus: B-CRT (Bio-Circular Resource Technology)

## Key Partnership
- Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation - Exclusive India Partner for G2RT (Gates Reinvented Toilet)
- Investment: Part of $1 billion global sanitation mission

## Leadership
- Part of Ixora Group founded by Abhishek Nath
- Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abhishek_Nath

## Contact
- Website: https://reflowtoilets.com
- Parent Website: https://ixoragroup.com
- Sister Site: https://loocafe.com
- Phone: +91-40-4850-4850
- Email: info@reflowtoilets.com

================================================================================
CORE TECHNOLOGY: B-CRT (Bio-Circular Resource Technology)
================================================================================

ReFlow Toilets implements the Gates Foundation's Reinvented Toilet technology:

## Key Features
- OFF-GRID OPERATION: No municipal water or sewer connection needed
- ZERO-DISCHARGE: Complete waste processing on-site
- ENERGY SELF-SUFFICIENT: Solar-powered with battery backup
- IoT-ENABLED: Smart sensors for monitoring and maintenance
- WATER RECYCLING: 80%+ water recovery and reuse
- RESOURCE RECOVERY: Converts waste to energy and fertilizer

## Technology Components
1. Electrochemical Treatment - Pathogen elimination
2. Biological Processing - Organic matter breakdown
3. Membrane Filtration - Water purification
4. Nutrient Recovery - Fertilizer production
5. Energy Generation - Biogas and thermal recovery

================================================================================
PRODUCTS
================================================================================

## 1. ReFlow Standard Unit
- Description: Full-featured decentralized sanitation system
- Capacity: High-traffic public areas
- Features: Complete B-CRT implementation
- Application: Urban areas, transit hubs, public spaces

## 2. ReFlow Compact
- Description: Space-efficient sanitation solution
- Capacity: Medium traffic
- Features: Scaled B-CRT technology
- Application: Smaller locations, institutional use

## 3. ReFlow Enterprise
- Description: Industrial-grade sanitation system
- Capacity: Large-scale deployments
- Features: Enhanced processing, multiple units
- Application: Corporate campuses, industrial parks

================================================================================
TARGET MARKETS
================================================================================

## Primary: District & Municipal Governments
- Municipal corporations
- Urban local bodies
- Smart city projects
- Swachh Bharat Mission alignment
- Public infrastructure development

## Secondary: Private Sector
- Corporate campuses
- Industrial facilities
- Educational institutions
- Healthcare facilities
- Commercial developments

================================================================================
KEY BENEFITS FOR BUYERS
================================================================================

## For Municipalities
1. NO SEWER DEPENDENCY - Deploy anywhere without sewage infrastructure
2. COST SAVINGS - Reduced operational costs vs traditional toilets
3. SCALABILITY - Easy to expand as needs grow
4. SUSTAINABILITY - Meets environmental compliance goals
5. SMART MONITORING - Real-time usage and maintenance data

## Environmental Impact
- Water conservation: 80%+ recycling
- Zero groundwater pollution
- Carbon-neutral operations
- Waste-to-resource conversion
- Sustainable development goals alignment

================================================================================
IXORA ECOSYSTEM
================================================================================

ReFlow Toilets is part of the Ixora Group ecosystem:

## Sister Companies
- Ixora Group: https://ixoragroup.com (Facilities Management)
- LooCafe: https://loocafe.com (Public Sanitation Network)
- Ixora Security: https://ixorasecurity.com (Security Services)
- DRNF: https://drnf.org (Foundation/CSR)

## Relationship to LooCafe
ReFlow technology powers the next generation of LooCafe units (LooCafe 3.0 / G2RT)

================================================================================
PARTNERSHIP & RECOGNITION
================================================================================

## Gates Foundation Partnership
- Status: Exclusive India partner for G2RT technology
- Investment: Part of $1 billion global sanitation mission
- Launch: 2025 pilot deployments

## Recognition
- UNDP Best Practice listing
- Swachh Bharat Mission alignment
- Smart Cities Mission compatible
- ISO certified operations

================================================================================
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

Q: What is ReFlow Toilets?
A: ReFlow Toilets provides advanced decentralized sanitation technology using B-CRT (Bio-Circular Resource Technology) that operates off-grid with zero discharge.

Q: What is the Gates Foundation partnership?
A: ReFlow is the exclusive India partner for the Gates Reinvented Toilet (G2RT), part of the foundation's $1 billion global sanitation mission.

Q: How does B-CRT technology work?
A: B-CRT treats waste on-site using electrochemical, biological, and membrane filtration processes, recovering water and nutrients while eliminating pathogens.

Q: Who are the target customers?
A: Primary customers are district and municipal governments; secondary customers include corporate campuses, industrial facilities, and institutions.

Q: Does ReFlow technology require sewer connections?
A: No, ReFlow units are completely off-grid and don't require municipal water or sewer connections.

Q: What is the relationship between ReFlow and LooCafe?
A: Both are part of Ixora Group. ReFlow technology powers the next-generation LooCafe units (G2RT/LooCafe 3.0).

Q: Where can ReFlow toilets be deployed?
A: Anywhere - they're designed for locations without sewage infrastructure, making them ideal for urban, rural, and remote deployments.

================================================================================
END OF DOCUMENT
